info.name: LDS.org Better WideScreen
info.description:
Some changes to the LDS.org site. The goal is to use all your screen.
Mainly it changes:
- Wider Menus
- Lower Margins
info.additionalInfo:
This is based on:
https://userstyles.org/styles/113144/lds-org-new-style-tweaks

Which no longer is working for me.
